Projects

Here are some of my key technical projects that demonstrate my skills in computer architecture, systems programming, and security.

RISC-V Processor Implementation

GitHub

Implemented a 5-stage pipelined RISC-V processor in SystemVerilog, supporting the RV32I instruction set with hazard detection and forwarding units.

The design includes a branch predictor, separate instruction and data caches, and passes all test benchmarks with correct execution.

SystemVerilog FPGA Computer Architecture Digital Design

Kernel Memory Allocator

GitHub

Designed and implemented a custom kernel memory allocator with buddy system and slab allocation approaches for both small and large memory blocks.

Achieved 30% better memory utilization and 15% faster allocation/deallocation compared to the baseline implementation while maintaining thread safety.

C Linux Kernel Memory Management Systems Programming

Secure IoT Gateway

GitHub Demo

Built a security-focused IoT gateway running on Raspberry Pi that provides encryption, authentication, and intrusion detection for connected devices.

Implemented TLS for all communications, certificate-based device authentication, and anomaly detection to identify potentially compromised devices.

Python Embedded Linux MQTT Cryptography Network Security

391 Operating System

Collaborated within a team to architect and develop a ground-up operating system.

Leveraged skills in C programming, x86 assembly, and utilized a QEMU emulator for development

Implemented paging, terminal switching, filesystem, mouse and keyboard drivers, and PID support for up to 6 additional programs.

C (Programming Language) x86 Assembly git Operating System Design

Mailing List Generator

Went back to CloudBYZ to help optimize the tedious task of creating mailing lists

A set of two Google Apps Scripts that parses through either a Google Calendar or a Gmail inbox and creates a unique list of emails and names for use in a mailing list

Iterates through multiple arrays to collect email addresses and saves them to Google Sheets

Designed for and is used by CloudBYZâ€™s business and marketing teams
